Rhythmyx 6 Public API
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.percussion.cas

Class Summary
PSAddAssemblerInfo This post exit adds information needed in content assembler stylesheets to the result document.
PSAddChildInfo Queries the specified URL and appends the content of the returned doc to the current doc (as child of the root element).
PSAddPortalProperties Creates a properties element as used in portal publisher assemblers.
PSAuthtypeDispatcher This exit acts like a dispatcher to the appropriate authtype implementation resource.
PSAutoRelatedContent A Rhythmyx post exit.
PSCacheBySessionRule Used by server to determine if a request should be cached using the sessionid as one of the keys.
PSConcatAssemblyLocation This assembly location generator concatenates all provided parameters.
PSConcatWithIdAssemblyLocation This assembly location generator concatenates all provided parameters and adds the contentid at a given position.
PSCreatePortalPropertyList Creates a properties element as used in portal publisher assemblers.
PSCreatePortalPropertyListTest  
PSDatabasePublisher This exit is used to produce database publisher documents that conform to the sys_DatabasePublisher.dtd out of input documents conforming to the markup.dtd.
PSDefaultAssemblyLocation The default location generator for content assemblers.
PSFixAssemblyUrlForRevision This exit is intended to corrrect the related link URLs in assembly XML document for last public revision and typically goes onto a authtype implementation resource, for example, sys_casSupport/casSupport_1 or any custom authtype resource that needs corrections for tha last public revision.
PSGenerateAssemblerLink This UDF is a hybrid of makeIntLink and CasGenPubLocation.
PSGeneratePubLocation This generic UDF generates public locations for all contexts.
PSGenericAssembly Builds a delivery location by concatenating all the text nodes of the XML document returned by the specified resource.
PSGetSiteBaseUrl UDF to get the base URL string for a given site.
PSInsertAsRelatedItem This exit inserts the newly created item as the related item of the parent item.
PSModifyRelatedContent This exit handles all active assembly actions which modify the relationship tables.
PSPublishableContent Tests if the addressed content is publishable or not.
PSSiteFolderAuthTypeFilter Site Folder Publishing facilitates publishing of Content Items in a Content Explorer Site Folder tree to an identical folder tree on a delivery site or multiple delivery sites.
PSSysTemplateToSysVariantid This exit will turn the sys_template values into the appropriate sys_variantid by doing a lookup.
